casebody.data:
FAIRCHILD et al. v. EDSON. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by Charles S. Fairchild and others against Margaret B. Edson, impleaded.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and FOLLETT and PARKER. JJ.

No opinion. Motion for resettlement denied. See 28 N. Y. Supp. 402.
